title: Across the line - BBC Blogs
description: This is the home of news, reviews and features on the Northern Irish music scene, courtesy of Team ATL.

title: BBC History Research Blog - BBC Blogs
description: Every year the BBC opens its archives to a wide range of academics researching the BBC’s role in national and international history. Their research leads to bestselling books, academic papers and in-depth journalistic articles.

title: BBC Media Action - BBC Blogs
description: We believe in the power of media and communication to help reduce poverty and support people in understanding their rights.

title: BBC Music Introducing - BBC Blogs
description: It features advice for under-the-radar artists, the latest music from BBC Music Introducing acts and guest posts from our DJs and figures from around the music industry.

title: BBC Writersroom - BBC Blogs
description: Get behind-the-scenes insights from writers and producers of BBC TV and radio programmes.  Get top tips on script-writing and follow the journeys of writers who have come through BBC Writersroom schemes and opportunities.

title: Doctor Who - BBC Latest News
description: All the latest news and features from the world of Doctor Who.

title: feeling listless
description: "Poverty of goods is easily cured; poverty of the mind is irreparable.".

title: Springwatch - BBC Blogs
description: Springwatch, Autumnwatch and Winterwatch Blog. A place to talk UK Nature.

title: Strictly Come Dancing - BBC Blogs
description: We'll be sharing the latest news and backstage gossip from the nation's favourite dancing competition. This is the place to get your daily dose of dance floor drama and training room trials.
